text: Hindol is a village in the Bhiwani district of the Indian state of Haryana. Located in the Charkhi Dadri tehsil, it lies approximately south east of the district headquarters town of Bhiwani. , the village had 514 households with a total population of 2,564 of which 1,338 were male and 1,226 female. ==References== Category:Villages in Charkhi Dadri district
title: Hindol, Bhiwani
